items.name: Beacon
items.description:
PENDING REMOVAL
This item will (likely) be removed in a future update.

Currently only used as an ingredient in an alternative recipe.

items.name: Portable Miner
items.description: Can be set up on a resource node to automatically extract the resource. Note that it has limited storage space.

items.name: Alien DNA Capsule
items.description:
This data capsule translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetics information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

Go the extra kilometer! Knowledge is power, and power is just efficiency with fewer steps. Depositing Alien DNA Capsules in the AWESOME Sink provides FICSIT with knowledge, and Pioneers with Coupons.

items.name: Alien Protein
items.description:
Ground down Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposes and to research alien organisms.

items.name: Alumina Solution
items.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

items.name: Aluminum Casing
items.description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

items.name: Aluminum Ingot
items.description:
Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

items.name: Heat Sink
items.description: Used to dissipate heat faster.

items.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
items.description: Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets that are mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

items.name: Aluminum Scrap
items.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

items.name: Battery
items.description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and Vehicles.

items.name: Solid Biofuel
items.description: The most energy-efficient form of solid biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

items.name: Cable
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

items.name: Candy Cane
items.description:
A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. 
*Disclaimer: Can't be consumed...

items.name: Turbo Rifle Ammo
items.description: Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and fire rates, at the cost of accuracy.

items.name: Homing Rifle Ammo
items.description:
The bullet guidance system, build into this ammunition, allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for Pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.

items.name: Rifle Ammo
items.description: Standard issue Rifle ammunition, useful for establishing dominance.

items.name: Concrete
items.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

items.name: AI Limiter
items.description: AI Limiters are super advanced electronics that are used to control AIs and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

items.name: Circuit Board
items.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

items.name: Coal
items.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

items.name: Color Cartridge
items.description:
Used for applying Patterns to structures with the Customizer.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

items.name: Compacted Coal
items.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

items.name: Supercomputer
items.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

items.name: Computer
items.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

items.name: Cooling System
items.description: Used to keep temperatures of advanced parts and buildings from exceeding to inefficient levels.

items.name: Copper Powder
items.description:
Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, make this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

items.name: Copper Sheet
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

items.name: Crystal Oscillator
items.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

items.name: Power Shard
items.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

items.name: Blue Power Slug
items.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

items.name: Yellow Power Slug
items.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

items.name: Purple Power Slug
items.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

items.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
items.description: Control Rods regulate power output via electromagnetism.

items.name: Fabric
items.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

items.name: Gas Filter
items.description: Used in the Gas Mask to filter out toxics and pollutants from the air.

items.name: Sweet Fireworks
items.description:
Merry FICSMAS and a Happy New Year!

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

items.name: Fancy Fireworks
items.description:
Fireworks are produced from random ingredients. Primarily used for having a good time.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

items.name: Sparkly Fireworks
items.description:
Goes Pfffeeeeew... BOOM! *Sparkle*

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

items.name: Flower Petals
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

items.name: Empty Canister
items.description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

items.name: Packaged Fuel
items.description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

items.name: Empty Fluid Tank
items.description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

items.name: Biomass
items.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

items.name: FICSMAS Gift
items.description:
Special FICSMAS buildings and parts can be obtained and produced from this FICSIT Holiday present.

*Watch the sky for deliveries from orbit!

items.name: Caterium Ingot
items.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

items.name: Smokeless Powder
items.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

items.name: Black Powder
items.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

items.name: Hatcher Remains
items.description:
The shell-like remains an alien... thing.
Used for MAM research.

items.name: Iodine Infused Filter
items.description: Used in the Hazmat Suit to absorb radioactive particles.

items.name: Heavy Oil Residue
items.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

items.name: High-Speed Connector
items.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

items.name: Quickwire
items.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

items.name: Hog Remains
items.description:
The carapace of the alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

items.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
items.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

items.name: Iron Plate
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Iron Rod
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Screw
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Leaves
items.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

items.name: Liquid Biofuel
items.description: Liquid Biofuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

items.name: Fuel
items.description: Fuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

items.name: Crude Oil
items.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

items.name: Turbofuel
items.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

items.name: Fused Modular Frame
items.description: A corrosion resistant, nitride hardened, highly robust, yet lightweight modular frame.

items.name: Heavy Modular Frame
items.description: A more robust multi-purpose frame.

items.name: Radio Control Unit
items.description: Enhances and directs radio signals.

items.name: Modular Frame
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

items.name: Turbo Motor
items.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

items.name: Motor
items.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

items.name: Mycelia
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

items.name: Nitric Acid
items.description: Produced by reaction of Nitrogen Gas with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

items.name: Nitrogen Gas
items.description: Nitrogen can be used in a variety of ways, such as metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On Massage-2(AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

items.name: Cluster Nobelisk
items.description: A Nobelisk that detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical when clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.

items.name: Nobelisk
items.description: A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.

items.name: Gas Nobelisk
items.description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk creates a deadly gas cloud.

items.name: Nuke Nobelisk
items.description:
This Nobelisk uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.

WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.

items.name: Pulse Nobelisk
items.description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk generates a powerful shockwave.

items.name: Non-fissile Uranium
items.description:
The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be conversed into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

items.name: Uranium Fuel Rod
items.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

items.name: Uranium Waste
items.description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissible Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

items.name: Bauxite
items.description: Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

items.name: Copper Ore
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

items.name: Caterium Ore
items.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

items.name: Uranium
items.description:
Uranium is a radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

items.name: Packaged Alumina Solution
items.description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

items.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
items.description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

items.name: Packaged Nitric Acid
items.description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

items.name: Packaged Nitrogen Gas
items.description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

items.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
items.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

items.name: Packaged Oil
items.description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

items.name: Packaged Sulfuric Acid
items.description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

items.name: Packaged Water
items.description: Water, packaged for alternative transport.

items.name: Petroleum Coke
items.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

items.name: Plastic
items.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

items.name: Encased Plutonium Cell
items.description:
Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

items.name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
items.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

items.name: Plutonium Pellet
items.description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

items.name: Polymer Resin
items.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

items.name: Pressure Conversion Cube
items.description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

items.name: Quartz Crystal
items.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

items.name: Raw Quartz
items.description: Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

items.name: Explosive Rebar
items.description: Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

items.name: Shatter Rebar
items.description: This rebar fractures when shot, launching deadly debris in a wide spread but with limited range.

items.name: Stun Rebar
items.description:
Electrocutes the target on impact, stunning it for a short time.

Stun duration: 5 seconds

items.name: Rotor
items.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

items.name: Rubber
items.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

items.name: Silica
items.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

items.name: Actual Snow
items.description: It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.

items.name: Snowball
items.description:
Compressed dihydrogen monoxide crystals.

Alternative Nobelisk Ammo. Use G to swap!

items.name: Smart Plating
items.description: Project Part #1. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Versatile Framework
items.description: Project Part #2. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Automated Wiring
items.description: Project Part #3. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Modular Engine
items.description: Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Adaptive Control Unit
items.description: Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

items.name: Magnetic Field Generator
items.description:
Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

items.name: Assembly Director System
items.description:
Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

items.name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
items.description:
Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

items.name: Nuclear Pasta
items.description:
Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

items.name: Iron Rebar
items.description: A simple iron rebar that can be shot using the Rebar Gun, for self-defense purposes.

items.name: Plasma Spitter Remains
items.description:
The remains of a plasma spitting alien creature.
Used for MAM research.

items.name: Stator
items.description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

items.name: Steel Pipe
items.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

items.name: Encased Industrial Beam
items.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

items.name: Steel Beam
items.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

items.name: Stinger Remains
items.description:
The remains of whatever that creepy thing was.
Used for MAM research.

items.name: Limestone
items.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

items.name: Sulfur
items.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.

items.name: Sulfuric Acid
items.description: A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

items.name: Packaged Turbofuel
items.description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

items.name: Encased Uranium Cell
items.description:
Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore. 
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

items.name: Water
items.description: It's water.

items.name: Wire
items.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

items.name: Wood
items.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

items.name: Red FICSMAS Ornament
items.description: Used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

items.name: Blue FICSMAS Ornament
items.description: Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

items.name: Copper FICSMAS Ornament
items.description: Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

items.name: Iron FICSMAS Ornament
items.description: This super special... nope... still just used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

items.name: FICSMAS Ornament Bundle
items.description: All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more FICSMAS Decorations!

items.name: FICSMAS Bow
items.description: A fancy Bow, maybe someone can wear this? You certainly can't! Probably, some parts and decorations can be made from this.

items.name: FICSMAS Tree Branch
items.description: A special Tree Branch, used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.

items.name: FICSMAS Wonder Star
items.description: This special FICSMAS Star signifies the productivity of FICSIT all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Event, so it's time to get back to work.

items.name: FICSMAS Decoration
items.description: A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.
